::Element::

Element growls once more, feeling two plasma shots hit his armor. He 
was tempted to fire back, but he didn't want to do anything to end 
Firearm's life. The four missiles he shot previously were still 
circling about fifty feet above Astroblast.

"All I need is the Maximal back," he says calmly, forcing his anger 
under control, "If you give him to me, I will let you go peacefully. 
Your troops are damaged, and I can take them out before you get to 
your repair station."

He glances at Menasor's hand for a second, and then back at 
Astroblast. "Besides, that Maximal wouldn't survive the trip back. 
You would make your trip back to your base, under fire, and with 
nothing to show in the end but a full-fledged war against you."

Element's missile launchers arm a missile each, ready to fire.

place
